channel.title: Problems with Object-Teleports
channel.description:
Ok ... I know how to add a teleportobject. example : One of the teleporters from the clanwars ... But i don't know where to edit the teleportcoords ... I mean i click on the teleportobject and nothing ... So i want so ask where i edit that the teleporter tele me ... I have a 508 source. ( Basicly Bulby )
Sorry, for bad english. I am from germany. :) Hope anyone can help me.

item.title: Problems with Object-Teleports
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

Well, idk about 508s, but this is sorta simler, so if it was 317 and you would want to make a object teleport you when you click it what you do is this;
Get the object ID:
Then find where other objects are.
Put the object id down with the coords its at.
Then put the coords u want it to tele you.
and then put it with a break; and such. hope this helped.

Read full topic
